definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: The dish of boiled beef and carrot tastes good.
sentences.chinese: 那道清炖牛肉胡萝卜的菜味道不错。

sentences.english: A： Perhaps I could recommend mushroom soup and clear soup.
sentences.chinese: 也许我可以推荐清炖冬菇和清汤。

sentences.english: The main course was to be a whole poached salmon .
sentences.chinese: 主菜将是一整条清炖鲑鱼。

sentences.english: The stewed beef aroma was used to quante descriptive analysis.
sentences.chinese: 清炖牛肉风味通过描述分析评定。

sentences.english: Anyone who has had its dish of gently stewed beef with ground peanuts atop rice would agree it's delicious.
sentences.chinese: 任何一个吃过花生清炖牛肉那道菜都会同意它很美味。

definition: to stir-fry with oil only (no addition of water)
pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
salad with dressing/cold vegetables dressed with sauce (e.g. coleslaw)
